Articles.Content: I think that a mark 3 cargo bay would be really cool, as well as an actually working m.k.2-m.k.3(the new m.k.2 parts are a different size than the old ones) adapter, to make a shuttle
If you wait till 0.90 you will have a sort of Spaceplane Plus for Mk3 stock!
There's a cargo bay. I don't expect any more updates since Porkjet is overhauling the Mk. 3 parts anyway.
